summary: Request to add upsert Search Attribute functionality to the PHP SDK. The team confirmed this would be implemented after the release as a quick addition.
userImpact: Users cannot update search attributes for running workflows in the PHP SDK, limiting workflow discoverability and metadata management capabilities.
proposedFix: Implement upsert Search Attribute API in PHP SDK following patterns from other SDKs
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented in the PHP SDK after the release as planned by the maintainers
keyQuote: We will add upsert attribute after the release, it's quick to do.
